languages.text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
languages.original_text:
В начале боя персонаж получает 1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Он не может снять горение, пройдя проверку на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.
В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж накладывает {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} уровней горения на каждое существо на соседних клетках. Если таким образом горение наложено на вражеских ксеносов или демонов, они дополнительно получают {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 5%.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of burning and cannot remove burning through resistance tests.
At the end of their turn, the wielder inflicts twice their levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If those creature are xenos or daemon enemies, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} fire damage with 50% armour penetration.

At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of burning and cannot remove burning through resistance tests.
At the end of their turn, the wielder inflicts twice their levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If those creature are xenos or daemon enemies, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} fire damage with 50% armour penetration.

At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

At the end of their turn, the wielder inflicts twice their levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If those creature are xenos or daemon enemies, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} fire damage with 50% armour penetration.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of burning and cannot remove burning through resistance tests.
At the end of their turn, the wielder inflicts twice their levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If those creature are xenos or daemon enemies, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} fire damage with 50% armour penetration.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, çatışma başladığında 1 seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} maruz kalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testleriyle{/g} bu yanmayı ortadan kaldıramaz.
Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda bitişikteki tüm yaratıklarda {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} seviye yanma oluşturur. Etkilenen düşmanlar zeno veya iblisse %5 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri ile ilave {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alırlar.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Kullanan kişi, çatışma başladığında 1 seviye yanmaya maruz kalır ve direnç testleriyle bu yanmayı ortadan kaldıramaz.
Kullanan kişi, turunun sonunda bitişikteki tüm yaratıklarda {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} seviye yanma oluşturur. Etkilenen düşmanlar zeno veya iblisse %5 zırh delme değeri ile ilave {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} ateş hasarı alırlar.

Kullanan kişi, çatışma başladığında 1 seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} maruz kalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testleriyle{/g} bu yanmayı ortadan kaldıramaz.
Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda bitişikteki tüm yaratıklarda {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} seviye yanma oluşturur. Etkilenen düşmanlar zeno veya iblisse %5 zırh delme değeri ile ilave {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} ateş hasarı alırlar.

languages.text:
Al comienzo del combate, el portador sufre +1 nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y no puede eliminar este efecto mediante {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g}.
Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador inflige {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} niveles de quemadura a todas las criaturas adyacentes. Si los enemigos afectados son xenos o daemons, sufren {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} adicional con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 5 %.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al comienzo del combate, el portador sufre +1 nivel de quemadura y no puede eliminar este efecto mediante pruebas de fortaleza.
Al final de su turno, el portador inflige {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} niveles de quemadura a todas las criaturas adyacentes. Si los enemigos afectados son xenos o daemons, sufren {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} de daño de fuego adicional con una penetración de armadura del 5 %.

languages.text:
战斗开始时，装备者承受1级{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果，此燃烧效果即便在通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}后也无法移除。
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，对周围所有邻近生物造成{uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}燃烧等级的伤害。如果目标生物是异形或恶魔，还会额外造成{uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，此次火焰伤害拥有5%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
战斗开始时，装备者获得1级燃烧效果，此燃烧效果即便在通过抗性检定后也无法移除。
装备者的回合结束时，对周围所有邻近生物造成{uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}级燃烧效果。如果目标生物是异形或恶魔，还会额外受到{uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}点火焰伤害，此次火焰伤害拥有5%护甲穿透。

languages.text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur reçoit 1 niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et ne peut pas supprimer cet effet à l'aide de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g}.
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il inflige {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} niveaux de Combustion à toutes les créatures adjacentes. Si les ennemis touchés sont des xénos ou des démons, ils subissent également {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur reçoit 1 niveau de Combustion et ne peut pas supprimer cet effet à l'aide de tests de résistance.
À la fin de son tour, il inflige {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} niveaux de Combustion à toutes les créatures adjacentes. Si les ennemis touchés sont des xénos ou des démons, ils subissent également {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} points de dégâts de feu avec 5 % de pénétration d'armure.

languages.text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は1レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}中、炎上を取り除くことができない。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者は隣接するすべての生物に、{uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}炎上を付与する。対象となる敵がゼノやディーモンの場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}5%で追加の{uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は+1レベルの炎上を受け、抵抗判定中、炎上を取り除くことができない。
ターン終了時、使用者は隣接するすべての生物に、そのレベルの2倍の炎上を付与する。対象となる敵がゼノやディーモンの場合、アーマー貫通50%で追加の{uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}炎ダメージを受ける。

戦闘開始時、使用者は1レベルの炎上を受け、抵抗判定中、炎上を取り除くことができない。
ターン終了時、使用者は隣接するすべての生物に、{uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}炎上を付与する。対象となる敵がゼノやディーモンの場合、アーマー貫通5%で追加の{uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0}炎ダメージを受ける。

languages.text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes wird der Träger mit +1 Stufe "{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}" belegt und kann "Verbrennen" mit {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} nicht entfernen.
Am Ende seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} belegt der Träger alle Kreaturen auf angrenzenden Feldern mit {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} Stapeln "Verbrennen". Sind alle betroffenen Gegner Xenos oder Dämonen, erleiden sie zusätzlich {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 5 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes wird der Träger mit +1 Stufe "Verbrennen" belegt und kann "Verbrennen" mit Widerstandsproben nicht entfernen.
Am Ende seiner Runde belegt der Träger alle Kreaturen auf angrenzenden Feldern mit {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} Stapeln "Verbrennen". Sind alle betroffenen Gegner Xenos oder Dämonen, erleiden sie zusätzlich {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} Feuerschaden mit 5 % Rüstungsdurchdringung.

В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж накладывает {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} уровней горения на каждое существо на соседних клетках. В начале боя персонаж получает 1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Он не может снять горение, пройдя проверку на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.
